title: Bug 2529: Open/Close project not always available
description: When selecting both P1 and P2 projects, the Close Project menu item is not available in the Navigator. However, the Open Project menu item is available.
OB: The Close Project menu item is missing in the Navigator when selecting both P1 and P2 projects.
EB: Both the Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available in the Navigator when selecting multiple projects.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create two projects, P1 and P2. 2. Select P1 and P2 simultaneously. 3. Check if the Close Project menu item is missing in the Navigator.
